title.en: Merched y Wawr, Porthcawl Branch, Committee 1976
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Porthcawl, Pwyllgor 1976

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Cangen Porthcawl, llun o’r Pwyllgor yn y cinio ym 1976 yn ‘Little West’.  Ar gefn y llun mae’n dweud ‘Cerdyn Post Nadolig by Tudor Processing’
Sefyll – Jean Williams, Eirwen Evans, Betty Price, Winona Pearce, Betty Nicholas, Glenys John, Eluned Evans, Meira Ford, Blodwen Jones, Mari Guile
Eistedd – Gladys Howells, Dilys Francis, Myra Thomas
